WorkItem.Description: One thing that I have used a lot with Rawr2 is the ability to see how buffs/talents/options change my DPS.  In Rawr2, the Overall DPS was shown as a status bar at the bottom of the window, regardless of what screen I was on.  In Rawr3, the only way to view DPS is to go to the Stats tab and scroll down to where it's displayed (in DPSWarr, it's near the bottom).  It would be nice if the Overall Score was visible somewhere outside of the tabs, so it could be viewed from anywhere.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Can't view DPS from other windows

Comments.Message:
I actually made a comment about this back when the Closed Beta was first opened up. However after looking back, the issue was closed so you may not have seen it.
